actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 509 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to exempt libraries from the definition of private foundations.

summary.text: Exempts libraries from the definition of private foundations for treatment purposes under Internal Revenue Code of 1954. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 509)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 509 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to exempt libraries from the definition of private foundations.
